officialTitle: A Phase 2a Study of BMS-790052 and BMS-650032 in Combination Therapy With Japanese Subjects With Genotype 1 Chronic Hepatitis C (HCV) Virus Infection
inclusionCriteria:
* Subjects chronically infected with HCV Genotype 1
* HCV RNA viral load of ≥ 10\*5\* IU/mL (100,000 IU/mL) at screening
* Must have minimum age of 20 Years
* Must have maximum age of 75 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* Subjects with evidence of liver cirrhosis
* Evidence of HCC
* Co-infection with hepatitis B virus, HIV
